overview: A candid, heartbreaking, humorous, revealing look at the lives of teenagers who find the courage to finally speak their truths, and perform their real-life stories in the masterfully woven production, 'Project: Shattered Silence'. Despite what you think you know about this generation of teenagers, this documentary will enlighten, entertain, inspire, and It will tug at your heartstrings in a profound way. It could very well change your perceptions of young adults, and throw open a door of dialog for families for the first time.
title: Project: Shattered Silence
